name: BOOMRANGED
description:
RESTORE THE ENERGY OF YOUR SPACE SHUTTLE

Hello, here's our **first ludum's game** (and first game jam)! We are a team of three amators, ready to do our best during those 3 days of programming, composing music or drawing.
In this game, you incarnate a spaceman, lost on a planet far from earth, without any fuel left to continue his journey. You must go to a planet from another to collect energy dropped by dangerous aliens thanks to your futuristic boomrang in order to transfer this power into your ship.

CONTROLS :

 * WASD default (or ZQSD in parameters) to move
* F near from the space shuttle to restore energy
* Space to dash
* Mouse left click to shot

BAGUETTE TEAM :

* Risu - Game Art - http://risuniku-art.tumblr.com/
* Callicou Jack - Music/Sound Design -  http://soundcloud.com/callicou-jack/
* Narudgi - Game Design/Dev - http://narudgi.github.io/

* UPDATE : V1.1.1 Various fix /Ajustement/Optimisation *

*V1 IS THE JAM VERSION*
